response.overview: Mike Tyson's Greatest Hits is the only video available anywhere that captures the explosive career of this dynamic boxer. It’s an action-packed ringside replay of 28 of his greatest and most exciting fights—including 20 knockouts! Witness the raw punching power that made “Iron Mike” Tyson the most devastating fighter of his generation, and possibly of all time. Highlights include his history-making knockout of Trevor Berbick, which made him the youngest heavyweight champion in history; his devastating 30-second knockout of Marvis Frazier; and the unforgettable moment he became the only man to knock out long-time heavyweight champion Larry Holmes. This non-stop look at Tyson’s legendary rise is guaranteed to become a classic—and a must-have for every boxing fan.
response.title: Mike Tyson's Greatest Hits
